snippet.title: Longplay of Blood with Plasma
snippet.description:
Longplay of Blood with Plasma, played on MS-DOS. This game's version was released in 1997. Tell us what you think by leaving a comment down below!

0:00:00 - Start

0:00:48 - Intro Video

The Way of all Flesh
0:01:53 - E1M1: Cradle to Grave
0:06:07 - E1M2: Wrong Side of the Tracks
0:18:20 - E1M3: Phantom Express
0:28:24 - E1M4: Dark Carnival
0:42:00 - E1M8: House of Horrors (SECRET LEVEL)
0:51:24 - E1M5: Hallowed Grounds
1:05:44 - E1M6: The Great Temple
1:25:15 - E1M7: Altar of Stone (BOSS LEVEL)
1:27:48 - Ending Episode 1

Even Death May Die
1:28:38 - E2M1: Shipwrecked
1:37:40 - E2M2: The Lumber Mill
1:45:46 - E2M3: Rest for the Wicked
1:55:12 - E2M4: The Overlooked Hotel
2:12:20 - E2M9: Thin Ice (SECRET LEVEL)
2:22:14 - E2M5: The Haunting
2:41:12 - E2M6: The Cold Rush
2:48:48 - E2M7: Bowels of the Earth
2:59:22 - E2M8: The Lair of Shial (BOSS LEVEL)
3:00:51 - Ending Episode 2

Farewell to Arms
3:01:36 - E3M1: Ghost Town
3:10:26 - E3M2: The Siege
3:24:43 - E3M3: Raw Sewage
3:32:38 - E3M4: The Sick Ward
3:43:43 - E3M8: Catacombs (SECRET LEVEL)
3:54:40 - E3M5: Spare Parts
4:03:02 - E3M6: Monster Bait
4:15:23 - E3M7: The Pit of Cerberus (BOSS LEVEL)
4:17:33 - Ending Episode 3

Dead Rechoning
4:18:10 - E4M1: Butchery Loves Company
4:23:06 - E4M2: Breeding Grounds
4:28:55 - E4M3: Charnel House
4:41:44 - E4M4: Crystal Lake
4:52:15 - E4M9: Mall of the Dead (SECRET LEVEL)
5:05:20 - E4M5: Fire and Brimstone
5:12:15 - E4M6: The Ganglion Depths
5:24:35 - E4M7: In The Flesh
5:29:50 - Cutscene before Endboss
5:30:50 - E4M8: Hall of the Epiphany (BOSS LEVEL)
5:35:30 - Ending Episode 4

Post Mortem
5:36:20 - E6M1: Welcome To Your Life
5:43:50 - E6M2: They Are Here
5:51:34 - E6M3: Public Storage
6:02:01 - E6M4: Aqueducts
6:14:05 - E6M5: The Ruined Temple
6:21:53 - E6M6: Forbidden Rituals
6:33:03 - E6M9: Forgotten Catacombs (SECRET LEVEL)
6:40:01 - E6M7: The Dungeon
6:55:41 - E6M8: Beauty and the Beast (BOSS LEVEL)
6:58:50 - Credits

By: Retro Game Spacko
